import tkinter as tk import time # Create main window root = tk.Tk() root.title("Happy Promise Day ‚ù§Ô∏è") root.geometry("600x600") root.configure(bg="black") # Pages container pages = [] # Marathi Promise Messages messages = [ "‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§§‡•Å‡§≤‡§æ ‡§Ü‡§Ø‡•Å‡§∑‡•ç‡§Ø‡§≠‡§∞ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡•á‡§Æ ‡§ï‡§∞‡•á‡§®...! ‚ù§Ô∏è", "‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§§‡•Å‡§ù‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§µ‡§∞ ‡§®‡•á‡§π‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§µ‡§ø‡§∂‡•ç‡§µ‡§æ‡§∏ ‡§†‡•á‡§µ‡•á‡§®...! ü§û", "‡§§‡•Å‡§ù‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§™‡•ç‡§∞‡§§‡•ç‡§Ø‡•á‡§ï ‡§Ü‡§®‡§Ç‡§¶‡§æ‡§§ ‡§Ü‡§£‡§ø ‡§¶‡•Å‡§É‡§ñ‡§æ‡§§ ‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§§‡•Å‡§ù‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏‡•ã‡§¨‡§§ ‡§Ö‡§∏‡•á‡§®...! üòä", "‡§§‡•Å‡§ù‡•Ä ‡§∏‡•ç‡§µ‡§™‡•ç‡§®‡•á ‡§™‡•Ç‡§∞‡•ç‡§£ ‡§ï‡§∞‡§£‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ‡§∏‡§æ‡§†‡•Ä ‡§®‡•á‡§π‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§§‡•Å‡§ù‡•ç‡§Ø‡§æ ‡§∏‡•ã‡§¨‡§§ ‡§∞‡§æ‡§π‡•Ä‡§®...! ‚ú®", "‡§ï‡§ß‡•Ä‡§π‡•Ä ‡§§‡•Å‡§≤‡§æ ‡§è‡§ï‡§ü‡§Ç ‡§µ‡§æ‡§ü‡•Ç ‡§¶‡•á‡§£‡§æ‡§∞ ‡§®‡§æ‡§π‡•Ä...! ü§ó", "‡§Æ‡•Ä ‡§ï‡§æ‡§Ø‡§Æ ‡§§‡•Å‡§ù‡§æ ‡§∏‡§æ‡§• ‡§¶‡•á‡§à‡§®...! üíï", "Happy Promise Day My Love ‚ù§Ô∏è" ] # Function to create heart animation def draw_heart(canvas): heart = canvas.create_text(300, 100, text="‚ù§Ô∏è", font=("Arial", 80), fill="red") for _ in range(5): canvas.itemconfig(heart, fill="pink") root.update() time.sleep(0.5) canvas.itemconfig(heart, fill="red") root.update() time.sleep(0.5) # Function to fade in text def fade_in(widget): for i in range(1, 11): color = f"#FF0000{i*10}" widget.config(fg=color) root.update() time.sleep(0.1) # Function to switch pages def show_page(page_num): for page in pages: page.pack_forget() pages[page_num].pack() # Page 1: Welcome Screen page1 = tk.Frame(root, bg="black") canvas1 = tk.Canvas(page1, width=600, height=600, bg="black", highlightthickness=0) canvas1.pack() draw_heart(canvas1) welcome_label = tk.Label(page1, text="Happy Promise Day ‚ù§Ô∏è", font=("Arial", 24, "bold"), fg="white", bg="black") welcome_label.pack(pady=20) fade_in(welcome_label) next_button1 = tk.Button(page1, text="Next ‚û°", font=("Arial", 14), command=lambda: show_page(1), bg="red", fg="white") next_button1.pack(pady=20) pages.append(page1) # Page 2: Marathi Promise Messages page2 = tk.Frame(root, bg="black") message_label = tk.Label(page2, text="üíñ Promise for You üíñ", font=("Arial", 20, "bold"), fg="white", bg="black") message_label.pack(pady=20) y_position = 100 for msg in messages: label = tk.Label(page2, text=msg, font=("Arial", 16), fg="white", bg="black") label.pack() fade_in(label) y_position += 40 next_button2 = tk.Button(page2, text="Next ‚û°", font=("Arial", 14), command=lambda: show_page(2), bg="red", fg="white") next_button2.pack(pady=20) pages.append(page2) # Page 3: Final Love Page page3 = tk.Frame(root, bg="black") final_label = tk.Label(page3, text="üíû Forever Together üíû", font=("Arial", 22, "bold"), fg="white", bg="black") final_label.pack(pady=40) love_label = tk.Label(page3, text="I Promise to Love You Forever! ‚ù§Ô∏è", font=("Arial", 18), fg="pink", bg="black") love_label.pack() thank_you_label = tk.Label(page3, text="Thank You for Being Mine! üíñ", font=("Arial", 16), fg="lightblue", bg="black") thank_you_label.pack(pady=20) exit_button = tk.Button(page3, text="Exit ‚ùå", font=("Arial", 14), command=root.destroy, bg="red", fg="white") exit_button.pack(pady=20) pages.append(page3) # Show first page show_page(0) root.mainloop()
